co.cask.cdap.etl.api.action

Interface ActionContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SecureStore, SecureStoreManager, StageContext, Transactional

    public interface ActionContext
extends StageContext, Transactional, SecureStore, SecureStoreManager
    Represents the context available to the action plugin during runtime.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SettableArguments getArguments()
      Return the arguments which can be updated.
      long getLogicalStartTime()
      Returns the logical start time of the batch job which triggers this instance of an action.
      String getNamespace()

    • Method Detail

      • getLogicalStartTime

        long getLogicalStartTime()
        Returns the logical start time of the batch job which triggers this instance of an action. Logical start time is the time when the triggering Batch job is supposed to start if it is started by the scheduler. Otherwise it would be the current time when the action runs.
        Returns:
        Time in milliseconds since epoch time (00:00:00 January 1, 1970 UTC).

      • getArguments

        SettableArguments getArguments()
        Return the arguments which can be updated.

      • getNamespace

        String getNamespace()
        Returns:
        The application namespace
